thread.title: Non-Muslim Americans wear hijab in solidarity for World Hijab Day - BBC News
thread.title_full: Non-Muslim Americans wear hijab in solidarity for World Hijab Day - BBC News

title: Non-Muslim Americans wear hijab in solidarity for World Hijab Day - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Non-Muslim Americans wear hijab in solidarity for World Hijab Day 2 February 2017 Last updated at 03:11 GMT 
Women in America walked in the shoes of Muslim women by wearing a hijab for World Hijab Day. 
The BBC asked non-Muslim women why they decided to don the headscarf.
